title: E&M visits missing modifier 25
description: Multiple E&M services are being billed on the same day as procedures without modifier 25, resulting in denials.

example.issue: 99213 billed with 36415 on same day without modifier 25

suggestedAction: Add modifier 25 to the E&M code when billing with a procedure on the same day. Ensure documentation supports the separately identifiable service.

title: Bilateral procedures missing modifier 50
description: Bilateral surgical procedures are being submitted without the required bilateral modifier, causing underpayment or denials.

example.issue: 27447 (knee replacement) billed without modifier 50 for bilateral procedure

suggestedAction: Add modifier 50 for bilateral procedures or use RT/LT modifiers for unilateral procedures. Verify operative report confirms bilateral surgery.

title: Duplicate lab claims
description: Laboratory tests are being submitted multiple times for the same date of service without proper modifiers or justification.

example.issue: 85025 and 80053 billed on same day appear to be duplicates

suggestedAction: Review lab orders to ensure tests are medically necessary and not duplicative. Use modifier 91 if repeat testing is required on the same day.

title: Frequency limit violations
description: Routine screening tests are being ordered more frequently than policy allows without proper medical necessity documentation.

example.issue: 81001 (urinalysis) exceeds frequency limit of once per 30 days

suggestedAction: Check policy frequency limits before ordering routine tests. Document medical necessity if more frequent testing is required.

title: Place of service coding errors
description: Claims are being submitted with incorrect place of service codes that don't match where the service was actually performed.

example.issue: Office visit billed with incorrect place of service code

suggestedAction: Verify place of service code matches the actual location where the service was performed. Common codes: 11 (Office), 21 (Inpatient), 22 (Outpatient).
